alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 1:16PM EDT until July 02 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in south central Indiana... East central Hancock County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1215 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cloverport, Mystic, Skillman, Goering, Sample, Dodd, Tobinsport, Holt, Ammons and Sunny Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
